meanings.definition: A plant of the borage family with bright blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: Buglosses grow in our garden and have pretty blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: The buglosses in the field added a splash of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The buglosses whispered secrets to the other flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like buglosses in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scent of buglosses filled the air, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The bright blue flowers of the bugloss plant.
meanings.sent1: I picked a bouquet of buglosses to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent2: The buglosses swayed gently in the breeze, attracting bees.
meanings.sent3: The buglosses giggled as the wind tickled their petals.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a field of buglosses in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The buglosses danced under the moonlight, their color mesmerizing.
